The Turtle library:
The Turtle library is a fun and engaging library. It allows users to control a virtual “turtle” that
moves around the screen, drawing shapes and
patterns as it goes. With simplecommands,
students can create everything from basic
geometric shapes to intricate designs,
making coding both a creative and interactive
experience.
